org.parosproxy.paros.network

Class HttpBody

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.parosproxy.paros.network.HttpBody
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HttpRequestBody, HttpResponseBody

    public abstract class HttpBody
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract a HTTP body in request or response messages.

      • HttpBody

        public HttpBody(int capacity)
        Preallocate HttpBody of a certain size. A maximum of 128K is fixed to avoid overwhelming by incorrect contentlength.

      • createCachedString

      • getBytes

        public byte[] getBytes()
        Get the contents of the body as an array of bytes. The returned array of bytes mustn't be modified. Is returned a reference instead of a copy to avoid more memory allocations.
        Returns:
        a reference to the content of this body as byte[].

      • length

        public int length()
        Current length of the body.
        Returns:
        the current length of the body.

      • setLength

        public void setLength(int length)
        Set the current length of this body. If the current content is longer, the excessive data will be truncated.
        Parameters:
        length - the new length to set.

      • getCharset

        public java.lang.String getCharset()
